title: TABOO EROTICA: Taken By The Hockey Bad Boys: Hot Alpha Male Short Story of Naughty First Times
description: Luke was the all star hockey player on campus, Sammie was just a shy first year college student. She was untouched, and curvy, but always fantasized about a bad boy alpha male like Luke. When this muscular bad boy approaches Sammie out of no where things get heated fast! Many times over and over, all night long! Long, hard, and unprotected!
author: Kimber Woods
